name: GamutoWare
description:
GamutoWare is a student project to teach freshmen how to make games in Godot! This version of the game is a demo, and it will be updated with new microgames once people start making them

HOW TO PLAY

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Action - Space bar

Menu - Esc

CREDITS

Led by moraguma, in association with Gamux, and with the help of a lot of people

Full credits inside the game!
